body: Yeah, like that guy below me said, this is so new.

That's a very rare power dynamic. The futa's GF turns to stone upon reaching orgasm and this, in turn, makes her indestructible to whatever massive cumshot the futa can muster (that would otherwise kill any "normal" girl). Apparently stone girl stays conscious during the whole act and she turns back to normal after a long moment of respite. Honestly, that was so simple I'm surprised nobody even thought of that use of petrification.
